data.title: 14. Archdiocese of San Fernando, Pampanga
data.text:
Archidioecesis Sancti Ferdinandi

Created Diocese: 11 December 1948. Elevated to Archdiocese: 17 March

1975. Erected: 25 June 1975.Comprises the Civil Province of Pampanga,

City of San Fernando, Mabalacat City and Angeles City. Suffragans: the

Diocese of Balanga (Bataan), Iba (Zambales) and Tarlac (Tarlac). Titular: St.

Ferdinand, King. Secondary Patron: Our Lady of the Assumption.

Archbishop

Most Reverend

FLORENTINO GALANG LAVARIAS, DD

Born: 14 March 1957 in Sta. Ines, Mabalacat, Pampanga.

Ordained Priest: 26 September 1985. Episcopal Ordination:

12 August 2004. Installed as the Fourth Bishop, Diocese of

Iba, Zambales: 31 August 2004. Appointed as Archbishop of

San Fernando, Pampanga: 25 July 2014. Installed: 27 October

2014.

Arzobispado de Pampanga

San Jose, City of San Fernando, 2000 Pampanga

Tel./Fax: (045) 435-2408

Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

Archbishop Emeritus

Most Reverend

PACIANO BASILIO ANICETO, DD

Born: 09 March 1937 in Sta. Ana, Pampanga. Ordained Priest: 23 December

1962. Appointed Titular Bishop of Tlos and Auxiliary Bishop of Tuguegarao,

Cagayan: 07 April 1979. Episcopal Ordination: 27 May 1979. Appointed

Bishop of Iba, Zambales: 20 October 1983. Installed: 13 December 1983.

Appointed Archbishop of San Fernando, Pampanga: 31 January 1989.

Installed: 14 March 1989.

Mother of Good Counsel Seminary

Del Pilar, City of San Fernando, 2000 Pampanga

Tel.: (045) 961-2639 / (045) 961-8025

Fax: (045) 961-2639
